lines.text: Listen to me, you are our new hitman. I'm the boss now. I'm not going to carry you like Max did. This is your new job. You're going to make a lot of money. The hours are great, you hang out most of the time, it's fun!
Okay.
Now get the fuck out of here.
But, I thought, you were like my girlfriend.
Cosmo, I like you. Of all the people that pay to have sex with me, I like you the best.
What kind of car is this?
Lincoln Town Car.
Very smooth.
Very impressive. You killed this guy.
What did I just tell you? Please do not touch anything that's part of the driver's console. It's not safe. Besides, everything is set the way I like it.
It's not always this easy. This guy happens to be a moron.
Hey, look at all those asses. Room three is chock full of asses!
Hello everyone.
Alright, Jasmine has got the best ass!
Do you remember talking to me last night?
No, did I call you?
I called you.
Oh, good.
You sounded...
Weird.
I can get weird at night. It's nothing. You won't say anything to anyone, will you?
No.
Good man.
[pause]
Is this a car?
I took a Yoga class this morning.
Really?
I thought it might help me to relax.
I've tried that. I've tried everything. Glug, glug, glug - that's what works for me.
Don't you want to take that toilet paper off your face?
I really care if these guys see me this way.
Fine, just doesn't seem very professional to me.
You're bleeding. A lot.
No shit.
It's going to get on the upholstery.
Open the fucking door!
Remember, guns don't kill people, WE kill people.
If you've never been on a date before, how did you ever get laid?
You know, different ways...
Hookers.
Yeah.
And you've never had a girlfriend...
No, never. I *have* been seeing the same hooker for a while.
I love you.
Cosmo, if you love me, leave me alone.
[last lines]
Okay, this can work.

[puts his gun down]
That was close.
Yeah.
Champagne?
